import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const reduceCardNum = { width: '70%', padding: '10px 20px', borderRadius: '5px', border: '1px solid grey', WebkitAppearance: 'none' } const reduceSize = { width: '30%', padding: '10px 20px', borderRadius: '5px', border: '1px solid grey', WebkitAppearance: 'none' } const pDisplay = { paddingLeft: '10px', paddingRight: '10px', fontSize: '20px', display: 'inline' } function Card() { const [info, setInfo] = useState({ cardNum: '', cardType: '', cvv: '', month: '', year: '' }); const handleChange = (event) => { const {name, value} = event.target setInfo(prevState => { return{...prevState, [name]: value} }) } const handleSubmit = (event) => { const store = { 'card_type': info.cardType, 'card_num': Number(info.cardNum), 'cvv': Number(info.cvv), 'expire_mth': info.month, 'expire_yr': info.year }; event.preventDefault(); fetch('http://localhost:3090/api/card_info/', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', }, body: JSON.stringify(store), }) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { alert('Success') console.log(data); }) .catch((error) => { alert("Error:") console.log(error); }) } return ( <>

) } export default Card
